titles.title: Veterans' Memorials Protection Act of 2001
To amend title 18, United States Code, to prohibit desecration of Veterans' memorials.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime.

bill.summary: 5/25/2001--Introduced. Veterans' Memorials Protection Act of 2001 - Amends the Federal criminal code to impose penalties upon individuals who, in circumstances affecting interstate or foreign commerce, willfully injure or commit any degradation against any structure on public property commemorating the service of U.S. military personnel.
